syn: ne pas avoir toute sa tête
types.html:
ne pas avoir toutes ses frites dans le même sachet

  1. (Belgium, informal) to have a screw loose, to be a few sandwiches short of a picnic, to be one fry short of a Happy Meal
    Synonym: ne pas avoir toute sa tête
trans: to have a screw loose, to be a few sandwiches short of a picnic, to be one fry short of a Happy Meal
to have a screw loose, to be a few sandwiches short of a picnic, to be one fry short of a Happy Meal
